inn1.comm: first ball is very full, carefully defended to the leg side
pitched up again, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
punched back towards the bowler this time

Hafeez has got the big wicket, he's off on a celebratory run after getting Tamim lbw, that was slightly full from Hafeez pitching around middle, Tamim opted to play that off the back foot instead on coming forward, the ball slides on and strikes the pads, probably would have taken leg stump, height wasn't a problem there, Hafeez can't do a thing wrong these days
length ball outside off, defended towards cover off the front foot
looks to defend down the ground, gets a thick outside edge towards point
bowled on a good length outside off, got to the keeper on the bounce as Nafees let it go
a wide down the leg side, landed outside leg and went a touch further down
goodish length on the off, nips back in and he gets forward to defend it back to the bowler
shortish on the off, comes back in again, gets an inside edge onto the waist
good length on middle and leg, pushes it firm and straight to mid-on
back of a length on the off, knocks it down towards cover
shortish on leg stump, turned past square leg, thinks of a single but it isn't there
turns it towards midwicket off the front foot to get off the mark
angling in towards middle, gets forward and taps it into the leg side
shortish on the off, gets back and knocks it towards point
gets a stride out to that flighted delivery and defends it into the leg side
short of a good length outside off, turning away, knocked towards point
angling in towards middle and leg from round the wicket, defended into the leg side
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it into the leg side
back of a length on the off, gets back and defends it solidly in front of cover
back of a length on the off, rocks back and turns it towards midwicket
a touch fuller this time, targeting a good length and on target, just in the channel outside off, Naeem moves back and taps it to cover
a touch short on the off, rocks back and turns the face to push it towards midwicket
shoulders arms to that one, short of a good length, gets some movement away from the batsman, not much swing but there is some nip off the pitch for Gul
angling in towards middle, not turning, gets down the track and tries to knock it into the leg side
bowling it flat is Hafeez, on middle and off, comes down the pitch and pads it down
ooh, just short of slip, that turned and bounced, surprised him as he came down the track, pushed at it and got an edge but it landed just short of Younis
shortish on the off, waits for it to turn away and slaps it towards cover
sharp turn once again, beats Nafees completely, flat on the off and it spits away, he played inside the line to that one and had little clue
beaten, just a hint of away movement, lands on a good length and moves away to beat the outside edge as he prods at it from the back foot
pitched up this time, he's bowling with two slips, driven firmly and through the line but straight to mid-off

partly a misfield by Gul, a poor delivery there that's given Bangladesh a release, low full toss and it was driven back firmly, punched past Gul who made a half-hearted attempt to stop that, the first boundary for Bangladesh and their run-rate is above one an over now

another one goes! After that drive, Naeem couldn't tempt poking at a full delivery outside off, just moved away a hint and took the outside edge, Misbah stood firm at slip, watching it closely and took a good, low catch
goodish length on middle, rocks on the back foot and taps it down into the leg side
goodish, driving length outside off, Mushfiqur isn't going to fall for those, leaves it alone
edged but doesn't carry to first slip, some amount of turn for Hafeez, batsman pokes at the ball, which lands short of a diving Younis

edged and survives again, this time it is a thick edge, and Younis dives to his left, gets his hand on it but can't latch on to a tough chance, the ball rolls away towards backward point, Nafees in all sorts of trouble against spin
no the most confident of forward defensives from Mushfiqur
blocked towards short leg
gets it past a diving short leg this time, but not far enough to get a run
risky shot for a single, opens the face to guide a ball, which was close to off stump, past slip
just outside off, defended towards cover
on a length and in the channel around, batsman is tentative going forward as he blocks
that's one way for Bangladesh to increase their lethargic scoring rate, Gul bangs in the bouncer that takes off and flies high over the batsman and the keeper, that was far too short from Gul
better this time, short of a length and outside off, punched off the front foot towards cover
pitched up and on the leg stump, easily worked behind square leg by Mushfiqur, that gets him three

crazy running from Shariar, someone tell him to calm down, he tucks a legstump delivery to midwicket and sets off for a suicidal single, rightly sent back by Mushfiqur, Shahriar was a goner if there was a direct hit but Hafeez misses
punches the final ball of the over back towards the bowler

a good looking drive past extra cover from Mushfiqur, Saeed Ajmal may be the world's best ODI bowler but he shows again why he isn't he world's best fielder, a lazy attempt to stop that allows an extra run
looks to chop that one outside off, and misses, walks away towards square leg to admonish himself
jumps down the crease and enterprisingly chips the ball over mid-on for two
on the pads, looks to work it past short fine but can't time it
again closes the face, this time to a full ball on leg stump, the ball dribbles towards short leg
makes proper contact this time as he nudges the ball towards square leg, no run
short of length ball outside off, slices this one behind backward point
length ball on off stump, Mushfiqur drops the ball to the off side and the batsmen scamper a tight single
throws his bat at that one, looks to power it past point, can't beat the fielder
this time he threads it through, waits on the back foot and slams it between cover and point for four, there wasn't too much width to work with but that doesn't affect Shahriar
back of a length ball on leg stump, blocks it towards square leg
back of a length once again, on off and middle, Shahriar defends down the track
nearly sneaks through as Mushfiqur looks to defend to the off side, pushed out towards cover
outside off and that is left alone
pitched up and Mushfiqur wanted to muscle it down the ground, can't time it and the ball is easily stopped by Afridi
keeps bat and pad close together as he defends to the off side
massive appeal for lbw , in several stages as well, umpire seems to think that struck the batsman just outside off, Afridi doesn't though after Mushfiqur misses the cut, that was a close one
wide outside off, chops it towards backward point for a single
full delivery, almost a yorker, squeezed back towards the bowler
shorter from Malik, Mushfiqur jumps away from leg and slices it towards deep backward point for a single
looks to drive that through the off, inside-edges it towards the leg side, they scamper through a single
blocks this solidly off the front foot

Mushfiqur finally falls to the cut, that one from Shoaib bounces extra, it was wide outside off, Mushfiqur throws the bat at it but can only edge it to the keeper, he is extremely disappointed with that stroke, trudges off looking skywards
slides this in towards legstump, batsman backs away and defends towards off
this one turns in sharply as Afridi bowls from round the wicket, batsman takes a big stride forward as he blocks it

Afridi joins the party, again there's a lot of bounce for the bowler, again the batsman goes for the cut, again there's a top-edge, slices it to Shoaib Malik at backward point, and that's the fourth wicket, Nafees has had a horrid time today, looked completely out of place
slides this one on to leg stump, clipped behind square leg for a single
length ball outside off, Shakibul reaches for it and drives through off for a single
this match is heading for a very early finish, plenty of spin for Afridi, length ball turning away, Mahmudullah stretches forward to defend, the outside edge results, easy for Sarfraz, five down now
Nasir gets off the mark by easing the ball to long-on for a single
length ball outside off, driven towards sweeper cover for a single
that's a poor delivery, extras continue to be provide a healthy contribution to the Bangladesh total, this was way down the leg side
carefully defends this one outside off
"that's the line," screams the keeper as Malik probes around off
crisply driven towards extra cover, where Misbah dives to stop that one
pushed towards Misbah again, another dot ball
shortish ball, that stops on the batsman, turns away as well, Shakib doesn't try to force that one, gently taps it towards point, a rarity this, an over without a wicket
Afridi reacts as though he is expecting a wicket every ball, this one is defended towards cover
mistimed drive towards cover, batsmen zip through for a single
length ball just outside off, Shakib shuffles across and tucks the ball towards short fine leg for a single
drops it a touch short, batsman waits on the back foot for that to turn and then stabs it towards deep point
watches it closely as he presents the full face of the bat to defend
spins it towards off, slapped towards backward point where Malik fields
pitching on a length, on middle and turning in, helped behind square leg
slides this quicker, outside off, Shakib waits on the back foot and pokes it towards point
what a beauty that was from Malik, that drifts in, pitching around off,and spinning sharply away, past the outside edge, superb
big lbw appeal, looks to defend that length ball but it that one doesn;'t turn enough to convince the umpire that it would have struck leg
opens the face at the last moment to guide the ball towards backward point
works this one towards midwicket, not wide enough of the fielder to get a isngle
the googly, spins in towards leg, whipped towards square leg
beaten outside off, Shakib expects that one to turn in but it doesn't, he gropes for that outside off and can't get bat on it
a confidence-boosting stroke this, a bit short from Afridi, Shakib backs away to make room, chops this towards sweeper cover for three
the wrong ún nearly slips through the batsman's defences, he was waiting on the back foot towards for an expansive shot towards point, is hurried into keeping the ball out
gets a boundary for his efforts this time, it was overpitched by Afridi, Nasir launches the ball over mid-off, gets plenty of power on it to clear the in-field
slanting in towards off, defended
on the pads this time, gently nudged towards short fine leg for a single
spin in after pitching on a short of a length, batsman waits for it on the back foot and blocks
pitches it up this time, a length delivery around off, batsman stretches forward and guides the ball towards mid-on
length ball on middle stump, this is an arm ball, Shakib doesn;t have the room to power that to the off side, he manages towards cover
opens the face to steer the ball to short third man
good start as well, on a length and heading for off, defended
hit low on the bat as he looks to defend off the back foot
this one spins in too much, on the pads, batsman stands tall and pushes it towards mid-on
length ball heading for the pads, four dot balls in a row, this was clipped to square leg
there's the doosra, the batsman was tempted by that one, flirts with it outside off, and that ball bounces a lot as well, withdraws the bat at the last moment
punched past Ajmal, who dives to his right to try stop that, a single to end the over, a good one from Ajmal
driven towards long-on to get off the strike
sweeps a full ball towards midwicket, looks ungainly as he plays that
backs away and carves that towards sweeper cover
ooh, the extra count goes up, this time due to byes, outside off and that slips past the outside edge, beats the keeper as well
length ball on legstump, clipped behind square leg, a misfield there by Umar Akmal
stands tall and defends the final ball of the over towards cover
short of length ball turning in, defended back towards the bowler
inside-edge as Nasir looks to defend off the front foot, goes behind square leg
opens the face this time, steers the ball towards third man, skates through for two
gets forward and looks to turn the ball to the leg side, off the pads and towards slip
there's the doosra again, kept out by Nasir,defended towards the off side
short of length delivery on off stump to round off the over, Pakistan motoring through their overs here
bowls from wide of the crease, slides it in towards off stump, helped down to fine leg for a single
short and wide, room for the batsman to free his arms and he slaps that towards sweeper cover, a little to either side and that would have been a boundary, a poor delivery that
short of length ball heading for offstump, jabbed towards extra cover
slants this towards the off stump, short of length ball is blocked towards point
short and wide outside off, Nasir accepts the gift, stands tall and slashes it over point for a boundary
keeps it short again, a bit of width,  diving stop at cover, but there's an overthrow from Misbah
length ball outside off, solid forwards defence
tossed up by Ajmal, an lbw appeal, spins in but he is struck outside off
spins in and that is punched back towards the bowler
length ball slides on, punched towards mid-off
inside-edge, Nasir manages to survive, the ball rolls towards square leg for a single
short of length ball heading for off stump, solidly defended
short of length and on off stump, tapped towards short extra cover
and again, back of a length and just outside off, pushed back to the bowler

the end of Nasir, just when the partnership seemed to be steadying Bangladesh, a short ball that Nasir wanted to mow over midwicket, it strikes low on the bat and balloons towards short fine leg, the keeper calls early for it and settles under it, there's no Kamran Akmal moment either as Sarfraz calmly collects the skier
slides this in towards off stump, gets inside the line of that one as he defends to the off side
Cheema sticks to the template, short of length and hurtling towards off, more defence to end the over
tossed up length ball, watchfully defended towards point
slides through quicker, Shakib waits on the back foot for the cut, but that was pretty close to the body, Shakib misses

drama here, has Shakib chopped that on to the boot before it popped up to the keeper? Sarfraz was confident that was out, the third umpire is called for, Shakib was looking to watchfully defend this one, the ball hits his toe before bouncing on the pitch and flying to the keeper
short of length ball and outside off, chopped towards point off the back foot
length ball sliding on, careful defence towards the bowler
spin away from Shakib, who opens the face to guide the ball towards backward point
a bit of width on offer, guided towards deep backward point for a single
guides this behind square leg and scrambles two, the second run was a tight one
heading for off stump, punched towards mid-off from the crease
just outside off, steers it towards deep point for a single
length ball slanting in towards off, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
not the wisest of strokes that, a short of length ball that Reza wants to flat bat down the ground, mistimes it badly towards mid-off
full and wide, Shakib wants to crack that through the off side for a boundary, but Misbah throws himself to his left to stop that one

how many batsmen will get out playing the cut? it was well outside off, Shakib stretches to reach that and slaps it limply to point, not the finest of strokes that, and once again that man Afridi makes an instant impact
outside off and that is through to the keeper after the batsman initially flirts with it
outside off and that is left alone
punches that past the bowler to long-on, there's a direct hit from the deep but the second is easily completed
backs away and taps the ball towards point, Umar Akmal moves across from backward point to stop that one
Ajmal spins it past the outside edge

this is all too easy for Pakistan, Razzak closes the face of the bat too early, gets an edge to a delivery that's pitching around off, the edge flies to left of Younis, who clasps that one easily, eight down now and the crowd's mood further worsens
flat and full, defended off the front foot
inside-edged towards short leg as he looks to block that to the off side
length ball just outside off, blocked by the batsman
spins in after pitching well outside off, Shafiul looks to drive through the off, struck on the pad but outside off, a stifled appeal for lbw

and another one for Afridi, Reza is lbw, he was stretching forward to defend that one down the track, it spins past the inside edge and strikes the pads, that looked to be heading for legstump, the umpire thought so as well, Bangladesh are falling like nine pins, and Afridi hasn't even brought out his star-man celebration yet, perhaps if he gets a fifth
another lbw appeal, as this goes straight on, that was heading down leg
a touch nervously defended by Rubel off the front foot
this one was a wrong ún, th No. 11 doesn't care, not does he care that the cut has proved a dangerous stroke today, he manages to get bat on it and steer past slip for four
worked to midwicket for a single
quicker and down the leg side, helped towards fine leg for a couple
Ajmal looking to finish this off, a length ball that doesn't spin in much is defended down the track
pitched up and outside off, a muscular hit over cover for four, no point hanging around now and looking to defend, the crowd loves it
from round the wicket now, short of a length and heading for off, somehow the batsman gets the ball towards point
Bangladesh avoid the embarrassment of making their lowest score against Pakistan, a streaky boundary here, a flat and fast one from Ajmal, inside-edged towards fine leg
worked towards square leg for a single this time, the crowd seem to be enjoying themselves despite the trouble Bangladesh are in
fumbles for the ball outside off and is beaten
too wide outside off, slapped towards deep point for a single
wrong ún, spins in towards off, batsman opts to cut it again, he survives, gets the ball towards backward point

there's the five-for, Afridi doesn't bother celebrating, this one slides on, batsman looks to defend, inside-edges it on to his pad, the ball pops up for the keeper to come round in front of the stumps and collect that, Bangladesh rolled over for 91

inn2.comm: round the wicket, on middle and defended to the off side
touch short outside off, the batsman waits in his crease then cuts it late through backward point
comes onto the front foot and defends to cover
fired in towards middle and leg, defended to the on side
not much turn yet and it's softly defended into the off side
drags the length down a little outside but it's cut straight to backward point
starts way outside off stump and that's an easy call for the umpire
tighter to off stump this time and Farhat shoulders arms
good length on off stump, driven square into the covers
beaten as he drives with his feet stuck in concrete and fortunate not to get an outside edge
that's a good nut, touch shorter around off stump and it seams past the outside edge
swing and a miss...it was wide outside off stump which tempted Farhat but there wasn't much footwork as he threw his hands at the ball
wide again, it's been a very mixed bag in this over
back of a length around middle and off, punched firmly off the back foot to mid-off
dropped short and wide, that's a gift for the in-form Hafeez and he cuts it away to the point boundary
fuller this time, hint of turn and it's defended down towards short third man
poor stuff this, too much width and it's placed wide of backward point for the second boundary of the over
defended to the off side
on middle and leg, Hafeez comes forward and defends
touch shorter, pushed off the back foot to the off side and Razzak fields in his follow through
good length on off stump, punched firmly to the right of mid-off and it allows a quick single
goes back and defends to the leg side
whipped away from middle and off straight to midwicket
he's lucky to get away with that as it was very wide but it took a toe-end towards point
full on off stump, comes half forward and pushes to mid-on
back of a length and played back towards the bowler
nudged into the leg side fielded at square leg
short and cut for four through cover
good length, defended into the off side
full and driven, well fielded at midwicket
turned behind square on the leg side, fielded at square leg
cut for one just past point
driven into the cover, good diving save
good length, easily defended
decent length again and simply defended
flicked through square leg and races away to the fence
line outside off stump and defended into the covers
full length wide of off stump, mistimed cut to cover point
full length on leg stump, brief cry for leg before, mostly from the crowd
full again, driven back to the bowler
this time all wrong. Short and cut powerfully to the square fence
leg stump line, ball comes off the pad and runs into the leg side
poor line and a flick off the pads brings another boundary, this time to fine leg
much better. A good length on off stump and defended to cover
full length, defended back to the bowler
short and Hafeez misses out cutting straight to cover
middle stump line, defended off the back foot
hint of turn into the right hander, blocked awkwardly
full and the batsman comes forward and plays back to the bowler
Hafeez tried to use his feet, fired in a leg stump, ball comes off the pad but too wide for the keeper to effect a stumping
dropped, short and edged as Farhat looks to flick away off the back foot. Simple chance to first slip but straight through the hands of Nasir Hossain
whipped to square leg and easily fielded
moved off the back foot to mid-on fielder goes to his right to do the easy work
bouncer with some effort and hurries Hafeez who hooks and misses
full length on middle and leg and flicked out to deep square leg for an easy couple
back foot push from a length ball outside off to point
length ball on middle stump driven to cover
probably too short to cut that one on off stump. Farhat drags it down into his timbers and Bangladesh have at least something from this opening 10 overs
short and tucked square on the leg side straight to the fielder
short again and tucked out to deep midwicket for a single to get Younis away
flicked from leg stump in the region of leg slip who fields low to his left
off stump line and defended easily
back of a length and tucked out to midwicket
similar line and similar shot as Younis works it into the leg side
short of a length outside off, Younis is quickly onto the back foot and punches into the off side
fuller this time outside off and Hafeez drives it square towards gully
dragged down very short and it sits up for Hafeez who pulls it wide of mid-on
caught this time. Nasir has been moved out of first slip and Nafees shows him how to hold a catch as Hafeez guides it straight to him while trying to find third man with a late cut
a length ball is carefully blocked off the front foot
an inside-edged towards leg gully, Shakib has his hands on his head as he hoped that would go to the fielder

is there life in this match yet? Younis Khan is gone now, that was a poor decision from the umpire, the ball slides down the leg side, past the pads, and doesn't touch anything on its way to the keeper, bounces off Mushfiqur's pads and pops up as a catch, a loud appeal, umpire sends an unlucky Younis on his way
spinning away, Misbah plays with an open face towards slip
crouches low as he defends that off the front foot
this was floating down the leg side, Misbah looks to clip it towards square leg, off the back of the bat towards slip, suddenly Pakistan's batsmen are finding it hard to bat on this track
on the pads, tucked to square leg by Sarfraz Ahmed
a good-looking drive off the front foot, eases into the shot, sending it wide of the deep backward point to get a couple

make that four, the Mirpur crowd is howling in delight now, Sarfraz departs as he attempts to hook a bouncer, a bit of a top edge and the ball loops in front of square leg, where Shakib collects the chance, Bangladesh are pumped up
stands tall and punches off the back foot towards cover
short of length ball, again it is punched towards cover
length ball heading for off stump, blocked towards mid-on
length ball outside off, a big stride forward as Misbah blocks to the off side
more caution from Misbah, defending down the track
tapped towards short leg by Misbah
off the pads to short leg
reaches out and pokes an outside off delivery towards backward point
on the pads, Misbah shuffles across and tucks the ball to leg gully, where a smart bit of fielding ensures a maiden
length ball hurtling towards off, more watchfulness, probably shutting shop before the break now
nope, he rocks back and chops a short of length ball towards point, a dive from the man at backward point slows the ball down
length ball on off stump, blocked back towards the bowler
short and outside off, Misbah sways out of the line
pushes this length ball off the front foot towards cover
short of length ball on middle and off, patted back down the track
waits for the ball to arrive before thrusting his bat at it, guides it towards gully
whips this fuller one towards deep square leg
a hint of an outside edge as the batsman reaches out for an outside off ball, fielded by backward point, Misbah wanted one but was sent back by Umar
stretches forward and blocks this one
bat and pad studiously together as Misbah goives another demonstration of his forward defensive

whoah! steady on Misbah, where did that come from? swipes that fuller one over wide long-on for a six, no, that is not a typo, reaches forward and drags that from outside off, unpredictable as ever Pakistan
a bouncer, easy leave for Umar
outstanding stroke from Umar, who stands tall on the back foot and punches that square for four, wonderfully timed that, he doesn't bother to attempt running, he knew that was a boundary
attempts an offcutter, too far outside off Umar inside-edges the ball
steers this one down towards third man for a comfortable single

as straight as you can drive, hits the stumps at the non-striker's end and ricochets towards mid-on, the fielder was running across to his left and had to change direction to field, time enough to take one
solid defensive stroke from Umar to end the session
a boundary to start, overpitched and Misbah gives himself room and cracks it past cover for four
spins away after pitching just outside off, Msibah is initially drawn to that before withdrawing his bat
pats this towards mid-on and pinches the single

and another one, Umar Akmal is gone, Shakib's arm ball goes straight on with the angle to take the top of off, Umar was looking to cut that, expecting that the usual turn that would give him the room to play that stroke, does Afridi need to carry Pakistan with the bat as well?
Afridi goes for the sweep first up, from well outside off, off the body and wide of slip, Misbah immediately walks up to him and has a chat
sensible from Afridi, well outside off and he resists any urge to thump that one, leaves it through to the keeper
nothing can get past the dead bat of Misbah, solid defence
short of length and outside off, Misbah leaves
short of length ball on offstump, a nurdle behind square leg for a single
a bouncer to welcome Afridi, who ducks under that one
length ball slanting on to the pads, clipped towards deep backward square leg for a single
short of length and outside off, punches it off the back foot towards cover to end the over
pushed towards cover by Afridi
spins away after pitching on off,  blocked towards point

edged, and that was put down by the man at slip who could have taken that, Nafees was moving to his right initially as he saw Afridi go for the big swing, and then had to change direction to move to his left after the edge, gets his hand on the ball  but can't latch on, the crowd can't believe it
defended off the front foot to the leg side
way down the leg side
eased towards long-off for a single to end the over
pitched up and around off stump, driven towards mid-off by Misbah
short of length ball just outside off, Misbah shuffles across and tucks the ball towards square leg
heading for middle and off, again the batsman moves across the stumps and works the ball to the leg side
short of length ball outside off, pushed back towards the bowler
full ball swings in late, punched towards mid-on by Misbah
short ball outside off, an unflustered Misbah lets it go
backs away and muscles the ball towards extra cover
big stride forward as he smothers that one
beaten! look to push the ball towards cover, Misbah is drawn forward, the ball drifts in and spins away past the outside edge
goes deep in the crease and clips the ball towards midwicket
Shakib drops it short, Afridi rocks back and powers that towards long-on, can't get it wide enough of the fielder there, has to settle for a couple
huge shout for lbw, Razzak is desperate for the wicket, however that was sliding down leg as Misbah looked to defend
sprays it down the leg side
just outside off stump, Misbah steers the ball towards point
inside-edge this time as Misbah looks to defend, the ball squirts towards backward square leg
this one slides straight on, Afridi punches the ball off the back foot towards extra cover
Afridi looks to work this one with the angle towards the leg side, but edges it on to his pads
not the prettiest of strokes, a flat-batted hit that loops towards mid-on before rolling towards long-on
stretches forward and defends to the off side
fires this towards the leg stump, can't get it away
more of the Afridi we know and love, a pitched up delivery is driven inside-out and over cover for a boundary, Shakib closes his eyes in despair
pitched up again, and another boundary, skips away beyond leg and thumps it wide of mid-on for four more, it down to nine needed now
make that three in a row, and this match is ending in a hurry now, hammered past point for four more this time
well outside off, Afridi is utterly uninterested in that one, leaves it to the keeper
fuller arm ball, inside-edged back towards the bowler
looks to clip this towards square leg but can't get it away
the ball trickles towards the off side
pitched up and that is punched towards the bowler
that spins past the face of the bat as Misbah tries to steer an outside off delivery towards point
Afridi does a passable impression of Misbah, stretching forward and blocking to the off side
and once again, careful defence, how far away is the big hit?
there it is, backs away from legstump to make room, slices that fuller delivery towards sweeper cover but can't get it all the way to the rope

it's over Afridi gets a thick outside edge past slip to complete the win, it's Pakistan's 20th successive win over Bangladesh. Slightly bizarre fact: The only player to hit a six in this match is Misbah
